titleStmt.title: A proclamation, anent persons travelling to or from this kingdom.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed: Da. Moncreif, Cls. Secreti Concilis.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fourth day of May, and of our reign the third year, 1691.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
